articles.description: You can ride giant creatures and companions can help you while you're exploring.
articles.content:
The latest major No Mans Sky
 update is shaking up the exploration sim yet again by letting you befriend and adopt wild alien creatures. Given that the flora and fauna are procedurally generated, yo… [+1882 chars]
